mapper.select: SELECT isbn, book_name, book_pub, book_writerno, book_price, book_stock, book_pubdate, book_page, book_count, tag_no1, tag_no2, tag_no3, book_imgoriname, book_imgname, book_imgpath, book_imgsize, book_mainname, book_subname, book_content FROM book ORDER BY book_count DESC

SELECT isbn, book_name, book_pub, book_writerno, book_price, book_stock, book_pubdate, book_page, book_count, tag_no1, tag_no2, tag_no3, book_imgoriname, book_imgname, book_imgpath, book_imgsize, book_mainname, book_subname, book_content FROM book ORDER BY book_date DESC

select writer_no, writer_name, writer_work, writer_birth, writer_place, writer_imgoriname, writer_imgname, writer_imgpath, writer_imgsize, writer_info from writer where writer_info is not null and writer_info != ' ' order by rand();
SELECT review_no, profile_no, isbn, review_content, review_date, review_score FROM review

select book_name,DD.isbn,profile_name,review_score,review_content,review_date, member_id, book_imgname, book_content from (select isbn,profile_name,review_score,review_content,review_date,AA.member_id from profile AA join review BB on AA.member_id = BB.member_id) CC join book DD on CC.isbn=DD.isbn order by review_date
